title: Christina Pagel
summary: Christina Pagel (/ˈpɑːɡəl/ PAH-gəl) is a German-British mathematician and professor of operational research at University College London (UCL) within UCL's Clinical Operational Research Unit (CORU),[1] which applies operational research, data analysis and mathematical modelling to topics in healthcare. She was Director of UCL CORU from 2017 to 2022[2] and is currently Vice President of the UK Operational Research Society.[3] She also co-leads, alongside Rebecca Shipley, UCL's CHIMERA research hub which analyses data from critically ill hospital patients.[4]
